description.value: Transform your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-spells.Item.Nur1CbemWaor1hcv]{Eldritch Blast} into a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-spells.Item.WdsUqwEQJrjg3D5H]{Hellfire Blast}. When you do so, change the blast's damage type to fire, give it the unholy trait, and add @Damage[2d10[spirit]] damage to the damage roll.
